content: photo s left <- using a strand of red yarn sew a vertical line on the front of the chin for the chin detail this is optional ❖ eyelids photo s below using a strand of white yarn sew around each eye in almond shapes to make eyelids back details photo s left <- using a long strand of red yarn sew side-to-side stripes starting at the back of the head and going down the top of the reaper s head neck and back tapering off in width as they go down the back there s no exact placement for these just make sure the stripes are close together on each row of the reaper s back ❖ after finishing these final details the reaper is done any additional details are optional 1 4 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn all rights reserved all documents and pictures in said documents are property of megan nelson mysimplicitiesbymn no part of this publication may be reproduced and/or redistributed in any way part or whole it is prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes thank you for respecting copyright laws please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or concerns about the pattern simply mn25@gmail com mysimplicitiesbymn etsy shop mysimplicitiesbymn instagram meg nelson designs if you sell any items made from this pattern please make sure credit for the pattern is given to megan/mysimplicitiesbymn thank you & happy crocheting 1 5 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn all rights reserved all documents and pictures in said documents are property of megan nelson mysimplicitiesbymn no part of this publication may be reproduced and/or redistributed in any way part or whole it is prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes thank you for respecting copyright laws
